		<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Senior GA Officer PT PAC Consultant Jakarta General Affair]]></title>
		<link>https://job.web.id.ku/?p=2</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 10 Nov 2023 08:48:54 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[loker]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://None</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"></div>
</div>
<b>Senior Ga Officer PT PAC Consultant Jakarta Jakarta, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta </b>
<h3>Overview:</h3>
<blockquote><i>2 hari yang lalu
Pekerjaan tetap
PT PAC Consultant Jakarta
Jakarta, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta </i></blockquote>
About : <i>kerja kantor,jakarta,ID,2 hari yang lalu, Pekerjaan tetap,PT PAC Consultant Jakarta, Jakarta, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta ,Senior, Ga, Officer, Pt, Pac, Consultant, Jakarta, Jakarta, Daerah, Khusus, Ibukota, Jakarta</i>
<h3>Responsibilities:</h3>
<div class=""></div>
&nbsp;
<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"></div>
</div>
&nbsp;
<h3>Job Description:</h3>
<div class="">Mengelola lingkungan kerja kantor dan produk kantor: Perlengkapan Kantor (Meja Kantor, Kursi, Infocus, Loker dan, dll.)
- Bertanggung jawab atas dokumen urusan umum yang diperlukan untuk Audit
- Memproses faktur di dalam Departemen Urusan Umum
- Mengatur catering, vendor outsourcing, dan driver
- Kegiatan perbaikan lingkungan kerja: Menangani keluhan karyawan dengan kegiatan perbaikan
- Pelaksanaan tugas lain seperti menjaga hubungan dengan instansi pemerintah
- Pendidikan mínimal Diploma III atau Sarjana (semua jurusan)
- Diutamakan Berpengalaman Min. 3 Tahun Sebagai General Affair
- Mampu mengoperasikan komputer
- Bersedia penempatan WFO di Cikarang"Waspada terhadap Modus Penipuan pada saat proses interview. Perusahaan tidak akan memungut biaya apapun dalam melakukan proses interview. Mohon segera melaporkan ke kami, jika pada saat Anda diundang untuk interview dan diminta untuk melakukan pembayaran dengan sejumlah uang.""Please be aware of the Fraud Company. The company will ...
never be collecting any payment in the process of interview. Please immediately report to us if there's any companies that collecting payment to the Jobseekers</div>
Summary:
<div class="jobsummary">Pekerjaan tetap PT PAC Consultant Jakarta Jakarta Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta About kerja kantor jakarta ID 2 hari yang lalu Pekerjaan tetap PT PAC Consultant Jakarta Jakarta Daerah Khusus Ibukota</div>
Location:
<div class="joblocation">Jakarta, Daerah Khusus Ibukota Jakarta ID</div>
&nbsp;
<div class="mapouter">
<div class="gmap_canvas">

<iframe id="gmap_canvas" title=" Jakarta, Daerah Khusus Ibukota" src="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=++Jakarta%2C+Daerah+Khusus+Ibukota, ID&amp;t=&amp;z=18&amp;ie=UTF8&amp;iwloc=&amp;output=embed" width="100%" height="240px" frameborder="0" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>

</div>

<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"></div>
</div>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Range Cowboy 1 (ZX Ranch) Simplot   Paisley, OR]]></title>
		<link>https://job.web.id.ku/oregon/range-cowboy-1-zx-ranch-simplot-paisley/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 28 Apr 2023 00:02:11 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[jobs]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://None</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<img class="alignnone " src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSawr4JKK2RC0x_u6SeNQGd9rz2RxRrSz9juw&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="American Cowboy The ZX Ranch - American Cowboy ZX Ranch, Paisley, Oregon " width="538" height="352" />

<b>Range Cowboy 1 (ZX Ranch) Simplot Paisley, OR </b>
<h3>Overview:</h3>
<blockquote><i>No degree mentioned
Full-time
Simplot
Paisley, OR </i></blockquote>
<h3>Responsibilities:</h3>
<div class="">Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions
Knowledgeable in the areas of animal health and cattle conditions generally acquired with a minimum of four to five years related experience and/or training
Ability to read and comprehend simple instructions, short correspondence, and memos
Ability to write simple correspondence
Ability to effectively present information in one-on-one and small group situations to customers, clients, and other employees of the organization</div>
<div class=""><strong>MATHEMATICAL SKILLS</strong>
Ability to add and subtract two digit numbers and to multiply and divide with 10's and 100's
Ability to perform these operations using units of American money and weight measurement, volume, and distance
Ability to apply commonsense understanding to carry out detailed but uninvolved written or oral instructions
Ability to deal with problems involving a few concrete variables in standardized situations</div>
<div class=""><strong>CERTIFICATES, LICENSES, REGISTRATIONS</strong>
Must be a licensed driver of single axle vehicles
Ability to saddle and ride a horse
Specific vision abilities required by this job include distance vision, color vision, and depth perception
Assists Ranch Manager and Staff Veterinarian in the care and treatment of range cattle and/or cow-calf operations by performing the following duties
Rides on horseback in order to identify sick, injured, or stressed animals; gathers cattle on range and pasture; calves cows; supplements feed during winter; repairs pasture and range fences
Assists in treating sick or injured cattle by following an established medical treatment plan provided by the Staff Veterinarian and/or Ranch Manager/Foreman
Assists with processing and shipping cattle by sorting, branding, vaccinating, worming, and tagging
Moves cattle from pasture to pasture as directed by the Ranch Manager/Foreman
Provides care to horses by shoeing, doctoring, feeding, and grooming as necessary
Performs other duties as assigned by the Ranch Manager/Foreman
Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions
While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to sit and reach with hands and arms
The employee frequently is required to stand; walk; and use hands/fingers to handle, manipulate, or feel objects, tools, or controls
While performing the duties of this job, the employee regularly works in outside weather conditions and is regularly exposed to fumes or airborne particles
The employee occasionally works near moving mechanical parts and is occasionally exposed to wet and/or humid conditions</div>
<h3>Job Description:</h3>
<div class="">The J.R. Simplot Company is a diverse, privately held organization, with roots firmly planted in agriculture and agriculture-related businesses. The J.R. Simplot Company is a true farm-to-table company with operations that touch every aspect of agriculture, including seed production, farming and ranching, plant sciences, fertilizer manufacturing, food processing, commercial product development ...
and distribution.SUMMARY
Assists Ranch Manager and Staff Veterinarian in the care and treatment of range cattle and/or cow-calf operations by performing the following duties.ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES include the following. Other duties may be assigned.Rides on horseback in order to identify sick, injured, or stressed animals; gathers cattle on range and pasture; calves cows; supplements feed during winter; repairs pasture and range fences.Assists in treating sick or injured cattle by following an established medical treatment plan provided by the Staff Veterinarian and/or Ranch Manager/Foreman.Assists with processing and shipping cattle by sorting, branding, vaccinating, worming, and tagging.Moves cattle from pasture to pasture as directed by the Ranch Manager/Foreman.Provides care to horses by shoeing, doctoring, feeding, and grooming as necessary.Performs other duties as assigned by the Ranch Manager/Foreman.<strong>QUALIFICATIONS</strong> To perform this job successfully, an individual must be able to perform each essential duty satisfactorily. The requirements listed below are representative of the knowledge, skill, and/or ability required. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.<strong>EDUCATION and/or EXPERIENCE</strong>
Knowledgeable in the areas of animal health and cattle conditions generally acquired with a minimum of four to five years related experience and/or training.<strong>LANGUAGE SKILLS</strong>
Ability to read and comprehend simple instructions, short correspondence, and memos. Ability to write simple correspondence. Ability to effectively present information in one-on-one and small group situations to customers, clients, and other employees of the organization.

<strong>MATHEMATICAL SKILLS</strong>
Ability to add and subtract two digit numbers and to multiply and divide with 10's and 100's. Ability to perform these operations using units of American money and weight measurement, volume, and distance.

<strong>REASONING ABILITY</strong>
Ability to apply commonsense understanding to carry out detailed but uninvolved written or oral instructions. Ability to deal with problems involving a few concrete variables in standardized situations.

<strong>CERTIFICATES, LICENSES, REGISTRATIONS</strong>
Must be a licensed driver of single axle vehicles.

<strong>OTHER SKILLS AND ABILITIES</strong>
Ability to saddle and ride a horse. Must provide own tack.

<strong>PHYSICAL DEMANDS</strong> The physical demands described here are representative of those that must be met by an employee to successfully perform the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

While performing the duties of this job, the employee is regularly required to sit and reach with hands and arms. The employee frequently is required to stand; walk; and use hands/fingers to handle, manipulate, or feel objects, tools, or controls. The employee is occasionally required to stoop, kneel, crouch, or crawl. The employee must frequently lift and/or move up to 50 pounds and occasionally lift and/or move more than 100 pounds. Specific vision abilities required by this job include distance vision, color vision, and depth perception.

WORK ENVIRONMENT The work environment characteristics described here are representative of those an employee encounters while performing the essential functions of this job. Reasonable accommodations may be made to enable individuals with disabilities to perform the essential functions.

While performing the duties of this job, the employee regularly works in outside weather conditions and is regularly exposed to fumes or airborne particles. The employee occasionally works near moving mechanical parts and is occasionally exposed to wet and/or humid conditions. The noise level in the work environment is usually moderate.

Job Requisition ID: 13535

Travel Required: None

Location(s): L&amp;L ZX Ranch - Paisley

Country: United States

The J.R. Simplot Company is proud to be an Equal Opportunity Employer and will consider all qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, ancestry, age, sex, gender, gender identity, gender expression, genetic information, physical or mental disability, medical condition, sexual orientation, military or veteran status, marital status, or any other protected status

</div>

		<title><![CDATA[Cowboys Club Barista Legends Hospitality Frisco, TX]]></title>
		<link>https://job.web.id.ku/texas/cowboys-club-barista-legends-hospitality-frisco-tx/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 29 Apr 2023 14:08:40 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[jobs]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://None</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR65j3scpOQwrEU-P7QCRI2rO6SMFNfni4N9g&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="HOW TO MAKE MONEY DRIVING A 26-FOOT BOX TRUCK : u/megatranz" width="640" height="320" /></div>
</div>
<b>Cowboys Club Barista Legends Hospitality Frisco, TX </b>
<h3>Overview:</h3>
<blockquote><i>No degree mentioned
Full-time
Legends Hospitality
Frisco, TX </i></blockquote>
<h3>Responsibilities:</h3>
<div class="">The individual must possess the following knowledge, skills and abilities and be able to explain and demonstrate that he or she can perform the essential functions of the job, with or without reasonable accommodation
Can be trusted to act in a manner that is truthful and values direct, honest communication at all levels of the organization
Strong interpersonal skills; can effectively communicate and relate to all levels within and outside the organization; creates and builds positive and productive relationships
Can manage people and resources to get projects completed; has a strong ability to multi-task and keep order
Ability to work independently and/or in a team environment
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Must have computer skills:
Microsoft Word, Excel
Must be able to stand for an extended period of time without aid
Must be fluent in English
Menu planning and development
Must be able to stand or walk for varying length of time
Must be available to work an irregular schedule
Must be able to work extended hours due to business requirements including late nights, weekends and holidays
Must have at least 1 year experience in a high volume bar
Must be able read, write, and speak in English
Ability to stand, sit, use of hands to handle, or feel, reach with hands and arms
Ability to lift and/ or move up to 25 pounds;
Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision and distance vision
Licenses &amp; Certifications
Follows all Company drink recipes and procedures to provide high quality and consistent beverages to guest
Ensures that all customers are educated on our products and services
Answers customer questions regarding coffee blends, preparation, and product freshness
Greets all customers with fast, friendly, personalized service
Accurately rings sales orders into POS system and counts back change to customers in a courteous and friendly manner
Develops an understanding of coffee and tea regions and the various differences in flavor and blends
Sells and serves baked goods and miscellaneous food items to customers
Maintains a clean and organized workspace so that partners can locate resources and product as needed
Other duties as assigned</div>
&nbsp;
<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSIHmN3UawaTaP8PFzqMcrahGDNvTEuBCooXQ&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="Truck &amp; Van Rental Archives - Page 6 of 25 - Marcus Allard Truck Rental" width="640" height="249" /></div>
</div>
&nbsp;
<h3>Job Description:</h3>
<div class="">

Description

The World Headquarters for the Dallas Cowboys, the Star is the most comprehensive NFL training facility in the country. In addition to serving as the home of the entire football operation and practice fields, The Ford Center at The Star also includes a multipurpose, 12,000 seat, indoor stadium that will provide facilities for use by the Dallas Cowboys, City of Frisco and Frisco ISD ...
football and soccer games.

The facility includes Cowboys Club: a workspace and membership club connecting work, leisure and culture for a select community of influencers, entrepreneurs, and business leaders with a passion for the Dallas Cowboys.

The Barista is based out of The Star/Cowboys Club in Frisco, TX and reports to the Beverage Manager.
<h4>Essential Job Functions</h4>
<ul>
 	<li>Follows all Company drink recipes and procedures to provide high quality and consistent beverages to guest</li>
 	<li>Ensures that all customers are educated on our products and services.</li>
 	<li>Answers customer questions regarding coffee blends, preparation, and product freshness.</li>
 	<li>Greets all customers with fast, friendly, personalized service</li>
 	<li>Accurately rings sales orders into POS system and counts back change to customers in a courteous and friendly manner</li>
 	<li>Develops an understanding of coffee and tea regions and the various differences in flavor and blends.</li>
 	<li>Sells and serves baked goods and miscellaneous food items to customers</li>
 	<li>Maintains a clean and organized workspace so that partners can locate resources and product as needed</li>
 	<li>Other duties as assigned</li>
</ul>
Knowledge, Skills and Ability

The individual must possess the following knowledge, skills and abilities and be able to explain and demonstrate that he or she can perform the essential functions of the job, with or without reasonable accommodation.
<ul>
 	<li>Excellent customer service</li>
 	<li>Can be trusted to act in a manner that is truthful and values direct, honest communication at all levels of the organization</li>
 	<li>Strong interpersonal skills; can effectively communicate and relate to all levels within and outside the organization; creates and builds positive and productive relationships</li>
 	<li>Responds quickly and effectively to changing trends and circumstances; embraces change and welcomes fresh perspectives; learns from past mistakes and adjusts accordingly</li>
 	<li>Ability to manage appropriate steps to get projects completed; has strong abilities to organize people and processes; can create a plan for resourceful workflow</li>
 	<li>Can manage people and resources to get projects completed; has a strong ability to multi-task and keep order.</li>
 	<li>Detail Oriented</li>
 	<li>Ability to work independently and/or in a team environment</li>
 	<li>Strong verbal and written communication skills</li>
 	<li>Must have computer skills:</li>
</ul>
Microsoft Word, Excel.

Required Qualifications:
<ul>
 	<li>Must be able to stand for an extended period of time without aid</li>
 	<li>Must be fluent in English</li>
 	<li>Menu planning and development</li>
 	<li>Must be able to stand or walk for varying length of time</li>
 	<li>Must be available to work an irregular schedule</li>
 	<li>Must be able to work extended hours due to business requirements including late nights, weekends and holidays.</li>
</ul>
Preferred

Qualifications:
<ul>
 	<li>Must have at least 1 year experience in a high volume bar.</li>
 	<li>Must be able read, write, and speak in English.</li>
</ul>
Physical Requirements:
<ul>
 	<li>Ability to stand, sit, use of hands to handle, or feel, reach with hands and arms</li>
 	<li>Ability to lift and/ or move up to 25 pounds;</li>
 	<li>Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision and distance vision</li>
</ul>
Environmental

Working Conditions:
<ul>
 	<li>The noise level in the work environment is usually moderate.</li>
</ul>
Legends is an Equal Opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, or genetic information.
<h4>Qualifications</h4>
Skills

Preferred
<ul>
 	<li>Microsoft Office(Excel, PPT, Word, Outlook):</li>
</ul>
Expert

Licenses &amp; Certifications
<h4>Preferred</h4>
<ul>
 	<li>Alcohol Awareness</li>
</ul>
• Serv Safe-food handling

<script type="application/ld+json">{"@context": "https://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "title": "Cowboys Club Barista Legends Hospitality   Frisco, Tx   ", "description": "Description\n\nThe World Headquarters for the Dallas Cowboys, the Star is the most comprehensive NFL training facility in the country. In addition to serving as the home of the entire football operation and practice fields, The Ford Center at The Star also includes a multipurpose, 12,000 seat, indoor stadium that will provide facilities for use by the Dallas Cowboys, City of Frisco and Frisco ISD ...\n football and soccer games.\n\nThe facility includes Cowboys Club: a workspace and membership club connecting work, leisure and culture for a select community of influencers, entrepreneurs, and business leaders with a passion for the Dallas Cowboys.\n\nThe Barista is based out of The Star/Cowboys Club in Frisco, TX and reports to the Beverage Manager.\n\nEssential Job Functions\n\n\u2022 Follows all Company drink recipes and procedures to provide high quality and consistent beverages to guest\n\n\u2022 Ensures that all customers are educated on our products and services.\n\n\u2022 Answers customer questions regarding coffee blends, preparation, and product freshness.\n\n\u2022 Greets all customers with fast, friendly, personalized service\n\n\u2022 Accurately rings sales orders into POS system and counts back change to customers in a courteous and friendly manner\n\n\u2022 Develops an understanding of coffee and tea regions and the various differences in flavor and blends.\n\n\u2022 Sells and serves baked goods and miscellaneous food items to customers\n\n\u2022 Maintains a clean and organized workspace so that partners can locate resources and product as needed\n\n\u2022 Other duties as assigned\n\nKnowledge, Skills and Ability\n\nThe individual must possess the following knowledge, skills and abilities and be able to explain and demonstrate that he or she can perform the essential functions of the job, with or without reasonable accommodation.\n\n\u2022 Excellent customer service\n\n\u2022 Can be trusted to act in a manner that is truthful and values direct, honest communication at all levels of the organization\n\n\u2022 Strong interpersonal skills; can effectively communicate and relate to all levels within and outside the organization; creates and builds positive and productive relationships\n\n\u2022 Responds quickly and effectively to changing trends and circumstances; embraces change and welcomes fresh perspectives; learns from past mistakes and adjusts accordingly\n\n\u2022 Ability to manage appropriate steps to get projects completed; has strong abilities to organize people and processes; can create a plan for resourceful workflow\n\n\u2022 Can manage people and resources to get projects completed; has a strong ability to multi-task and keep order.\n\n\u2022 Detail Oriented\n\n\u2022 Ability to work independently and/or in a team environment\n\n\u2022 Strong verbal and written communication skills\n\n\u2022 Must have computer skills:\nMicrosoft Word, Excel.\n\nRequired Qualifications:\n\n\u2022 Must be able to stand for an extended period of time without aid\n\n\u2022 Must be fluent in English\n\n\u2022 Menu planning and development\n\n\u2022 Must be able to stand or walk for varying length of time\n\n\u2022 Must be available to work an irregular schedule\n\n\u2022 Must be able to work extended hours due to business requirements including late nights, weekends and holidays.\n\nPreferred\n\nQualifications:\n\n\u2022 Must have at least 1 year experience in a high volume bar.\n\n\u2022 Must be able read, write, and speak in English.\n\nPhysical Requirements:\n\n\u2022 Ability to stand, sit, use of hands to handle, or feel, reach with hands and arms\n\n\u2022 Ability to lift and/ or move up to 25 pounds;\n\n\u2022 Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision and distance vision\n\nEnvironmental\n\nWorking Conditions:\n\n\u2022 The noise level in the work environment is usually moderate.\n\nLegends is an Equal Opportunity employer. 		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="separator"><div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img alt='HOW TO MAKE MONEY DRIVING A 26-FOOT BOX TRUCK : u/megatranz' src='https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR65j3scpOQwrEU-P7QCRI2rO6SMFNfni4N9g&usqp=CAU' width='640' height='320' /></div></div><br /><br /><br /><b>Cowboys Club Barista Legends Hospitality   Frisco, TX   </b>  <h3>Overview:</h3> <blockquote><i>No degree mentioned
Full-time<br/> Legends Hospitality<br/>  Frisco, TX   </i></blockquote><h3>Responsibilities:</h3> <div class"jobresponsibilities"> The individual must possess the following knowledge, skills and abilities and be able to explain and demonstrate that he or she can perform the essential functions of the job, with or without reasonable accommodation
Can be trusted to act in a manner that is truthful and values direct, honest communication at all levels of the organization
Strong interpersonal skills; can effectively communicate and relate to all levels within and outside the organization; creates and builds positive and productive relationships
Can manage people and resources to get projects completed; has a strong ability to multi-task and keep order
Ability to work independently and/or in a team environment
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Must have computer skills:
Microsoft Word, Excel
Must be able to stand for an extended period of time without aid
Must be fluent in English
Menu planning and development
Must be able to stand or walk for varying length of time
Must be available to work an irregular schedule
Must be able to work extended hours due to business requirements including late nights, weekends and holidays
Must have at least 1 year experience in a high volume bar
Must be able read, write, and speak in English
Ability to stand, sit, use of hands to handle, or feel, reach with hands and arms
Ability to lift and/ or move up to 25 pounds;
Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision and distance vision
Licenses & Certifications
Follows all Company drink recipes and procedures to provide high quality and consistent beverages to guest
Ensures that all customers are educated on our products and services
Answers customer questions regarding coffee blends, preparation, and product freshness
Greets all customers with fast, friendly, personalized service
Accurately rings sales orders into POS system and counts back change to customers in a courteous and friendly manner
Develops an understanding of coffee and tea regions and the various differences in flavor and blends
Sells and serves baked goods and miscellaneous food items to customers
Maintains a clean and organized workspace so that partners can locate resources and product as needed
Other duties as assigned</div><br /><div class="separator"><div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img alt='Truck & Van Rental Archives - Page 6 of 25 - Marcus Allard Truck Rental' src='https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSIHmN3UawaTaP8PFzqMcrahGDNvTEuBCooXQ&usqp=CAU' width='640' height='249' /></div></div><br /><br /><br /> <h3>Job Description:</h3> <div class"jobdescription">Description

The World Headquarters for the Dallas Cowboys, the Star is the most comprehensive NFL training facility in the country. In addition to serving as the home of the entire football operation and practice fields, The Ford Center at The Star also includes a multipurpose, 12,000 seat, indoor stadium that will provide facilities for use by the Dallas Cowboys, City of Frisco and Frisco ISD ...
 football and soccer games.

The facility includes Cowboys Club: a workspace and membership club connecting work, leisure and culture for a select community of influencers, entrepreneurs, and business leaders with a passion for the Dallas Cowboys.

The Barista is based out of The Star/Cowboys Club in Frisco, TX and reports to the Beverage Manager.
<H4>
Essential Job Functions
</H4>
<ul>
<li>Follows all Company drink recipes and procedures to provide high quality and consistent beverages to guest</li>

<li>Ensures that all customers are educated on our products and services.</li>

<li>Answers customer questions regarding coffee blends, preparation, and product freshness.</li>

<li>Greets all customers with fast, friendly, personalized service</li>

<li>Accurately rings sales orders into POS system and counts back change to customers in a courteous and friendly manner</li>

<li>Develops an understanding of coffee and tea regions and the various differences in flavor and blends.</li>

<li>Sells and serves baked goods and miscellaneous food items to customers</li>

<li>Maintains a clean and organized workspace so that partners can locate resources and product as needed</li>

<li>Other duties as assigned</li>
</ul>
Knowledge, Skills and Ability

The individual must possess the following knowledge, skills and abilities and be able to explain and demonstrate that he or she can perform the essential functions of the job, with or without reasonable accommodation.

<li>Excellent customer service</li>

<li>Can be trusted to act in a manner that is truthful and values direct, honest communication at all levels of the organization</li>

<li>Strong interpersonal skills; can effectively communicate and relate to all levels within and outside the organization; creates and builds positive and productive relationships</li>

<li>Responds quickly and effectively to changing trends and circumstances; embraces change and welcomes fresh perspectives; learns from past mistakes and adjusts accordingly</li>

<li>Ability to manage appropriate steps to get projects completed; has strong abilities to organize people and processes; can create a plan for resourceful workflow</li>

<li>Can manage people and resources to get projects completed; has a strong ability to multi-task and keep order.</li>

<li>Detail Oriented</li>

<li>Ability to work independently and/or in a team environment</li>

<li>Strong verbal and written communication skills</li>

<li>Must have computer skills:</li>
Microsoft Word, Excel.

Required Qualifications:

<li>Must be able to stand for an extended period of time without aid</li>

<li>Must be fluent in English</li>

<li>Menu planning and development</li>

<li>Must be able to stand or walk for varying length of time</li>

<li>Must be available to work an irregular schedule</li>

<li>Must be able to work extended hours due to business requirements including late nights, weekends and holidays.</li>

Preferred

Qualifications:

<li>Must have at least 1 year experience in a high volume bar.</li>

<li>Must be able read, write, and speak in English.</li>

Physical Requirements:

<li>Ability to stand, sit, use of hands to handle, or feel, reach with hands and arms</li>

<li>Ability to lift and/ or move up to 25 pounds;</li>

<li>Specific vision abilities required by this job include close vision and distance vision</li>

Environmental

Working Conditions:

<li>The noise level in the work environment is usually moderate.</li>

Legends is an Equal Opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, age, national origin, disability, or genetic information.
<H4>
Qualifications

Skills

Preferred
</H4>
<ul>
<li>Microsoft Office(Excel, PPT, Word, Outlook):</li>
</ul>Expert

Licenses & Certifications
<H4>
Preferred
</H4>
<ul>
<li>Alcohol Awareness</li>
</ul>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Lowongan Kerja Karyawan Pabrik PT. Omron Manufacturing]]></title>
		<link>https://job.web.id.ku/cikarang/lowongan-kerja-karyawan-pabrik-area-purwakarta-juni-2022-pt-omron/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 28 Apr 2023 17:29:18 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[jobs]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://None</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQKt5OWgUE5_ISzMQAUVlxLIROG9LPiLNFhyMhGpGVtpw&amp;usqp=CAU&amp;ec=48665698" alt="PT Kereta Api Pariwisata Buka Lowongan Kerja di Banyak Kota, Simak Persyaratannya Halaman all - Kompas.com" width="640" height="320" /></div>
</div>
<b>Lowongan Kerja Karyawan Pabrik PT. Omron Manufacturing of Indonesia Nagri Kidul, Kabupaten Purwakarta, Jawa Barat </b>
<h3>Overview:</h3>
<blockquote><i>Pekerjaan tetap
PT. Omron Manufacturing of Indonesia
Nagri Kidul, Kabupaten Purwakarta, Jawa Barat </i></blockquote>
<h3>Responsibilities:</h3>
<div class=""></div>
&nbsp;
<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRTXDEJXkoWG-CIDC6qz89aZQUSr3fNeiuy_nVXbn8n9Q&amp;usqp=CAU&amp;ec=48665698" alt="Lowongan Kerja PT Linknet,Tbk FIRST MEDIA Bandung &amp; Purwakarta April 2022 - Info Loker Bandung Terbaru 2023" width="640" height="359" /></div>
</div>
&nbsp;
<h3>Job Description:</h3>
<div class="">

PT Omron Manufacturing of Indonesia, sebuah perusahaan elektronik terdepan yang berasal dari Jepang, membuka kesempatan berkarir untuk posisi Operator Produksi, Quality Control, Staff Admin, dan Assembling. Perusahaan ini telah beroperasi di Indonesia selama lebih dari 25 tahun dan terus tumbuh serta berkembang dengan memproduksi Sensor, Counter, Timer, dan memberikan solusi bisnis untuk Otomasi Industri.

Untuk kualifikasi, pelamar minimal berusia 18 tahun dan maksimal 28 tahun, memiliki latar belakang pendidikan SMA/SMK dari semua jurusan, bebas narkoba dan memiliki SKCK, sehat jasmani dan rohani dibuktikan dengan surat dokter, serta siap ditempatkan di Cikarang, Bekasi.

Apabila Anda berminat dengan lowongan kerja di PT Omron Manufacturing of Indonesia, Anda dapat mengajukan lamaran melalui online pada alamat yang tertera di bawah ini. PT Omron Manufacturing of Indonesia berlokasi di Kawasan Industri EJIP Plot 5C Sukaresmi, Cikarang Selatan Bekasi 17550.

&nbsp;

</div>
Summary:
<div class="jobsummary">Apabila Anda berminat dengan lowongan kerja di PT Omron Manufacturing of Indonesia, Anda dapat mengajukan lamaran melalui online pada alamat yang tertera di bawah ini.</div>
Location:
<div class="joblocation">Nagri Kidul, Kabupaten Purwakarta, Jawa Barat ID</div>
&nbsp;
<div class="mapouter">
<div class="gmap_canvas">

<iframe id="gmap_canvas" src="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=++Nagri+Kidul%2C+Kabupaten+Purwakarta%2C, ID&amp;t=&amp;z=18&amp;ie=UTF8&amp;iwloc=&amp;output=embed" width="100%" height="240px" frameborder="0" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>

<style>.mapouter{ position:relative;text-align:right;height:100%;width:100%;}</style> <style>.gmap_canvas {overflow:hidden;background:none!important;height:360px;width:100%;}</style></div>
</div>
&nbsp;
<div><strong>Job Key Points</strong> :

&nbsp;
<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTmS3dt0iYfgpBSpMK4kBaX_y47uEQ1SX6ukLl8synLMg&amp;usqp=CAU&amp;ec=48665698" alt="Lowongan Kerja Terbaru Juli 2022 di MR DIY untuk Lulusan SMA/SMK, Ada Penempatan Kerja di Jawa Barat - Tribunjabar.id" width="640" height="359" /></div>
</div>
<a style="border-radius: 8px; margin-top: 16px; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 14px; text-decoration: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; padding: 10px; font-family: inherit; text-shadow: none; user-select: none; transition: all,.1s,ease-in; background-color: #0099e5; border: 1px solid #0099e5; color: #ffffff;" href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfQbtn-Hp9ctu5kf2hgC2tBEHqnwNwhSQgwIf367iXeR5ignQ/viewform?entry.406204652=Lowongan Kerja Karyawan Pabrik Area Purwakarta Juni 2022 Pt. 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Karyawan Pabrik PT Kota Blitar, Jawa Timur]]></title>
		<link>https://job.web.id.ku/blitar/karyawan-pabrik-pt-sentosa-inti-dharma-blitar-kota-blitar-jawa/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 29 Apr 2023 15:59:55 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[jobs]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://None</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRI-8QDxpDnxO1aO46g7mHa_x-8P4EAViprdg&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="Karyawan Terpapar Corona, Pabrik Sampoerna Hentikan Produksi Rokok | merdeka.com" width="640" height="320" /></div>
</div>
<b>Karyawan Pabrik PT Sentosa Inti Dharma Blitar, Kota Blitar, Jawa Timur </b>
<h3>Overview:</h3>
<blockquote><i>Pekerjaan tetap
PT Sentosa Inti Dharma
Blitar, Kota Blitar, Jawa Timur </i></blockquote>
<h3>Responsibilities:</h3>
<div class=""></div>
&nbsp;
<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR_ZLisgJl_aJ_rfptCa6Hl06kuIKjI-C4XGQ&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="Pastikan Karyawan Pabrik Aman Dari Covid-19, Pemkab Sambangi PT. Parkland World Indonesia - Berita Terbaru Hari Ini" width="640" height="273" /></div>
</div>
&nbsp;
<h3>Job Description:</h3>
<div class="">

Selamat Datang di Situs Lowongan Kerja Indonesia Terbaru 2023 dan Saat ini kami ingin memberitahukan Info Terbaru Mengenai Informasi Loker dari Perusahaan PT Sentosa Inti Dharma dengan posisi Karyawan Pabrik. Untuk selengkapnya silahkan baca deskripsi lowongan kerja di bawah ini dengan seksama dan teliti, beserta persyaratan minimal lowongan kerja di yang telah tertera dan dijelaskan di bawah ini.

PT Sentosa Inti Dharma melalui program rekrutmennya saat ini sedang membuka lowongan kerja untuk posisi Karyawan Pabrik di Blitar yang bertujuan untuk meningkatkan kinerja operasional di dalam maupun luar kantor PT Sentosa Inti Dharma. Perusahaan Tersebut sedang mencari calon tenaga kerja yang siap diterjunkan ke setiap divisi bagian perusahaan yang sesuai dengan posisi, kemampuan dan keahlian para pencari kerja tersebut. Berikut ini adalah detail lengkap persyaratan untuk posisi Karyawan Pabrik di Blitar Perusahaan PT Sentosa Inti Dharma:

Tugas / Tanggung Jawab :
<ul>
 	<li>Melakukan tugas dan ...</li>
</ul>
<h4>tanggung jawab diberbagai divisi sesuai posisi</h4>
<ul>
 	<li>Menjalankan SOP dalam setiap pekerjaan yang dilakukan</li>
 	<li>Memberikan laporan ke bagian kepala / supervisor pabrik serta manager</li>
 	<li>Posisi yang dibutuhkan : Operator Produksi, Quality Control, Operator Mesin, Packing / Packer, Team Audit, Operator Forklift, dan Staff Gudang / Operator Gudang</li>
 	<li>Berdomisili di Blitar</li>
</ul>
Kualifikasi / Persyaratan :
<ul>
 	<li>Pria dan Wanita</li>
 	<li>Usia maksimal 35 tahun (QC, OM, PC, TA, OF, SG)</li>
 	<li>Usia maksimal 24 tahun (Operator Produksi)</li>
 	<li>Lulusan minimal SMA / SMK – S1</li>
 	<li>Dapat bekerja dalam team</li>
 	<li>Dapat menjaga keselamatan di ruang pabrik / kantor</li>
 	<li>Dapat berkomunikasi dengan baik</li>
 	<li>Dapat menjalankan SOP perusahaan</li>
 	<li>Sehat jasmani dan rohani</li>
</ul>
• Tidak buta warna

</div>
Summary:
<div class="jobsummary">Karyawan Pabrik PT Sentosa Inti Dharma Blitar Kota Blitar Jawa Timur Overview Pekerjaan tetap PT Sentosa Inti Dharma Blitar Kota Blitar Jawa Timur Responsibilities img alt 'Pastikan Karyawan Pabrik</div>
Location:
<div class="joblocation">Blitar, Kota Blitar, Jawa Timur ID</div>
&nbsp;
<div class="mapouter">
<div class="gmap_canvas">

<iframe id="gmap_canvas" src="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=++Blitar%2C+Kota+Blitar%2C+Jawa+Timur+++, ID&amp;t=&amp;z=18&amp;ie=UTF8&amp;iwloc=&amp;output=embed" width="100%" height="240px" frameborder="0" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>

<style>.mapouter{ position:relative;text-align:right;height:100%;width:100%;}</style> <style>.gmap_canvas {overflow:hidden;background:none!important;height:360px;width:100%;}</style></div>
</div>
&nbsp;
<div><strong>Job Key Points</strong> :
blitar,dharma,indonesia,inti,jawa,jawa timur,karyawan,kota,kota blitar,pabrik,pekerjaan tetap,pt,pt sentosa inti dharma,sentosa,timurkaryawan-pabrik-pt-sentosa-inti-dharma-blitar-kota-blitar-jawa</div>
&nbsp;
<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"></div>
</div>

		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="separator"><div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img alt='Karyawan Terpapar Corona, Pabrik Sampoerna Hentikan Produksi Rokok |  merdeka.com' src='https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRI-8QDxpDnxO1aO46g7mHa_x-8P4EAViprdg&usqp=CAU' width='640' height='320' /></div></div><br /><br /><br /><b>Karyawan Pabrik PT Sentosa Inti Dharma   Blitar, Kota Blitar, Jawa Timur   </b>  <h3>Overview:</h3> <blockquote><i>Pekerjaan tetap<br/> PT Sentosa Inti Dharma<br/>  Blitar, Kota Blitar, Jawa Timur   </i></blockquote><h3>Responsibilities:</h3> <div class"jobresponsibilities"> </div><br /><div class="separator"><div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img alt='Pastikan Karyawan Pabrik Aman Dari Covid-19, Pemkab Sambangi PT. Parkland  World Indonesia - Berita Terbaru Hari Ini' src='https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR_ZLisgJl_aJ_rfptCa6Hl06kuIKjI-C4XGQ&usqp=CAU' width='640' height='273' /></div></div><br /><br /><br /> <h3>Job Description:</h3> <div class"jobdescription">Selamat Datang di Situs Lowongan Kerja Indonesia Terbaru 2023 dan Saat ini kami ingin memberitahukan Info Terbaru Mengenai Informasi Loker dari Perusahaan PT Sentosa Inti Dharma dengan posisi Karyawan Pabrik. Untuk selengkapnya silahkan baca deskripsi lowongan kerja di bawah ini dengan seksama dan teliti, beserta persyaratan minimal lowongan kerja di yang telah tertera dan dijelaskan di bawah ini.

PT Sentosa Inti Dharma melalui program rekrutmennya saat ini sedang membuka lowongan kerja untuk posisi Karyawan Pabrik di Blitar yang bertujuan untuk meningkatkan kinerja operasional di dalam maupun luar kantor PT Sentosa Inti Dharma. Perusahaan Tersebut sedang mencari calon tenaga kerja yang siap diterjunkan ke setiap divisi bagian perusahaan yang sesuai dengan posisi, kemampuan dan keahlian para pencari kerja tersebut. Berikut ini adalah detail lengkap persyaratan untuk posisi Karyawan Pabrik di Blitar Perusahaan PT Sentosa Inti Dharma:

Tugas / Tanggung Jawab :
<li>Melakukan tugas dan ...</li>
<H4> tanggung jawab diberbagai divisi sesuai posisi</H4>
<ul>
<li>Menjalankan SOP dalam setiap pekerjaan yang dilakukan</li>
<li>Memberikan laporan ke bagian kepala / supervisor pabrik serta manager</li>
<li>Posisi yang dibutuhkan : Operator Produksi, Quality Control, Operator Mesin, Packing / Packer, Team Audit, Operator Forklift, dan Staff Gudang / Operator Gudang</li>
<li>Berdomisili di Blitar</li>
</ul>
Kualifikasi / Persyaratan :
<li>Pria dan Wanita</li>
<li>Usia maksimal 35 tahun (QC, OM, PC, TA, OF, SG)</li>
<li>Usia maksimal 24 tahun (Operator Produksi)</li>
<li>Lulusan minimal SMA / SMK – S1</li>
<li>Dapat bekerja dalam team</li>
<li>Dapat menjaga keselamatan di ruang pabrik / kantor</li>
<li>Dapat berkomunikasi dengan baik</li>
<li>Dapat menjalankan SOP perusahaan</li>
<li>Sehat jasmani dan rohani</li>
• Tidak buta warna</div> <br/><br/><br/><br/><br/><br/>Summary:<br/><div class="jobsummary"> Karyawan Pabrik PT Sentosa Inti Dharma Blitar Kota Blitar Jawa Timur Overview Pekerjaan tetap PT Sentosa Inti Dharma Blitar Kota Blitar Jawa Timur Responsibilities img alt 'Pastikan Karyawan Pabrik</div><br/><br/><br/>Location:<br/><div class="joblocation">  Blitar, Kota Blitar, Jawa Timur    ID</div><br/><br/><br/><div class="mapouter"><div class="gmap_canvas"><iframe width="100%" height="240px" id="gmap_canvas" src="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=++Blitar%2C+Kota+Blitar%2C+Jawa+Timur+++, ID&t=&z=18&ie=UTF8&iwloc=&output=embed" frameborder="0" scrolling="no" marginheight="0" marginwidth="0"></iframe><br/><style>.mapouter{ position:relative;text-align:right;height:100%;width:100%;}</style><style>.gmap_canvas {overflow:hidden;background:none!important;height:360px;width:100%;}</style></div></div><br/><br/><br/><br/><br/><br/><div><strong>Job Key Points</strong> :<br/>blitar,dharma,indonesia,inti,jawa,jawa timur,karyawan,kota,kota blitar,pabrik,pekerjaan tetap,peru,pt,pt sentosa inti dharma,sentosa,timur<br/><br/><br/>karyawan-pabrik-pt-sentosa-inti-dharma-blitar-kota-blitar-jawa</div><br/><br/><br/><div class="separator"><div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img alt='Karyawan Pabrik Tersedot Mesin Penghancur, Tersisa Tangan, Temannya  Kewalahan Tapi Lakukan Ini - Tribuncirebon.com' src='https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcTFMQvhpRWaVGgGTVdi7L9d05gxwUWZEyS_aA&usqp=CAU' width='640' height='359' /></div></div><br /><br /><br /><br/><br/><br/><a href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfQbtn-Hp9ctu5kf2hgC2tBEHqnwNwhSQgwIf367iXeR5ignQ/viewform?entry.406204652=Karyawan Pabrik Pt Sentosa Inti Dharma   Blitar, Kota Blitar, Jawa Timur   " style="border-radius: 8px;margin-top: 16px; Untuk selengkapnya silahkan baca deskripsi lowongan kerja di bawah ini dengan seksama dan teliti, beserta persyaratan minimal lowongan kerja di yang telah tertera dan dijelaskan di bawah ini.\n\nPT Sentosa Inti Dharma melalui program rekrutmennya saat ini sedang membuka lowongan kerja untuk posisi Karyawan Pabrik di Blitar yang bertujuan untuk meningkatkan kinerja operasional di dalam maupun luar kantor PT Sentosa Inti Dharma. Perusahaan Tersebut sedang mencari calon tenaga kerja yang siap diterjunkan ke setiap divisi bagian perusahaan yang sesuai dengan posisi, kemampuan dan keahlian para pencari kerja tersebut. Berikut ini adalah detail lengkap persyaratan untuk posisi Karyawan Pabrik di Blitar Perusahaan PT Sentosa Inti Dharma:\n\nTugas / Tanggung Jawab :\n\u2022 Melakukan tugas dan ...\n tanggung jawab diberbagai divisi sesuai posisi\n\u2022 Menjalankan SOP dalam setiap pekerjaan yang dilakukan\n\u2022 Memberikan laporan ke bagian kepala / supervisor pabrik serta manager\n\u2022 Posisi yang dibutuhkan : Operator Produksi, Quality Control, Operator Mesin, Packing / Packer, Team Audit, Operator Forklift, dan Staff Gudang / Operator Gudang\n\u2022 Berdomisili di Blitar\n\nKualifikasi / Persyaratan :\n\u2022 Pria dan Wanita\n\u2022 Usia maksimal 35 tahun (QC, OM, PC, TA, OF, SG)\n\u2022 Usia maksimal 24 tahun (Operator Produksi)\n\u2022 Lulusan minimal SMA / SMK \u2013 S1\n\u2022 Dapat bekerja dalam team\n\u2022 Dapat menjaga keselamatan di ruang pabrik / kantor\n\u2022 Dapat berkomunikasi dengan baik\n\u2022 Dapat menjalankan SOP perusahaan\n\u2022 Sehat jasmani dan rohani\n\u2022 Tidak buta warna", "responsibilities": " ", "hiringOrganization": {"name": "PT Sentosa Inti Dharma"}, "jobLocation": {"address": "Blitar, Kota Blitar, Jawa Timur, , ID"}, "datePosted": "2023-04-28"}</script><br/><br/><br/>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Lowongan Kerja 2023 Karyawan Pabrik PT Indofood]]></title>
		<link>https://job.web.id.ku/purwakarta/lowongan-kerja-2023-karyawan-pabrik-info-lowongan-kerja-april-pt/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 28 Apr 2023 15:41:50 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[jobs]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://None</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS9axc4kDmDbM1Jg_wsVopfF-kfxXkzk6fi1g&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="BUMN Pelni Buka Lowongan Kerja Terbaru 2023, Ini Syarat dan Posisinya Halaman all - Kompas.com" width="640" height="320" /></div>
</div>
<b>LOWONGAN KERJA 2023 KARYAWAN PABRIK | INFO LOWONGAN KERJA .. PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk Purwakarta, Kabupaten Purwakarta, Jawa Barat </b>
<h3>Overview:</h3>
<blockquote><i>17 hari yang lalu
Pekerjaan tetap
Rp 4,8 jt per bulan
PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk
Purwakarta, Kabupaten Purwakarta, Jawa Barat </i></blockquote>
<h3>Responsibilities:</h3>
<div class=""></div>
&nbsp;
<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcT5Y78E6OPHV63Sk1-ddTuTNqPk0eJOgQ1WdA&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="Lowongan Kerja untuk Lulusan SMK Mesin dan Listrik di Anak Perusahaan PLN" width="640" height="314" /></div>
</div>
&nbsp;
<h3>Job Description:</h3>
<div class="">

PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk membuka lowongan kerja untuk tahun 2023. Perusahaan ini merupakan perusahaan terkemuka dalam bidang solusi pangan yang terlibat dalam seluruh tahapan produksi makanan. Sudono Salim mendirikan perusahaan ini pada tahun 1990 dengan nama PT Panganjaya Intikusuma. Visi dan misi perusahaan adalah menyediakan solusi pangan yang berkelanjutan, memberikan kontribusi pada kesejahteraan masyarakat dan lingkungan, meningkatkan nilai pemangku kepentingan secara berkelanjutan, dan meningkatkan kompetensi karyawan, proses produksi, dan teknologi.

Lowongan kerja tersedia untuk pria atau wanita dengan pendidikan minimal SMA/SMK sederajat dan tinggi badan minimal 160 cm untuk pria dan 150 cm untuk wanita. Kandidat harus sehat secara jasmani dan rohani, tidak buta warna, dan bersedia bekerja dengan sistem shift. Dokumen yang dibutuhkan adalah CV, surat lamaran kerja, fotokopi KTP, fotokopi kartu keluarga, fotokopi ijazah/SKHUN, dan pas foto.

Jika Anda merasa memenuhi persyaratan dan bersemangat untuk bergabung dengan perusahaan, silakan kirimkan lamaran Anda melalui tautan yang tersedia. Perusahaan berharap Anda dapat menemukan pekerjaan yang sesuai dengan keinginan dan kualifikasi Anda. Untuk informasi lebih lanjut, silakan kunjungi informasi lowongan kerja tahun 2023 di sini.

</div>
Summary:
<div class="jobsummary">Rp 4 8 jt per bulan PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk Purwakarta Kabupaten Purwakarta Jawa Barat Responsibilities Job Description LOWONGAN KERJA 2023 LOKER VIA ONLINE PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk</div>
Location:
<div class="joblocation">Purwakarta, Kabupaten Purwakarta, Jawa Barat ID</div>
&nbsp;
<div class="mapouter">
<div class="gmap_canvas">

<iframe id="gmap_canvas" src="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=++Purwakarta%2C+Kabupaten+Purwakarta%2C, ID&amp;t=&amp;z=18&amp;ie=UTF8&amp;iwloc=&amp;output=embed" width="100%" height="240px" frameborder="0" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>

<style>.mapouter{ position:relative;text-align:right;height:100%;width:100%;}</style> <style>.gmap_canvas {overflow:hidden;background:none!important;height:360px;width:100%;}</style></div>
</div>
&nbsp;
<div><strong>Job Key Points</strong> :
2023,8 jt per bulan,april,barat,indofood,info,jawa,jawa barat,kabupaten,kabupaten purwakarta,karyawan,kerja,lowongan,makmur,pabrik,pekerjaan tetap,peru,pt,pt indofood sukses makmur tbk,purwakarta,rplowongan-kerja-2023-karyawan-pabrik-info-lowongan-kerja-april-pt</div>
&nbsp;
<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRiIB8iE6zZadHSi6V37liEabdsGvYcLHXp9w&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="Lowongan Kerja: PT AHM di Kawasan MM2100 Rekrut 300 Karyawan Laki-laki, Berikut Persyaratannya - Tribunbekasi.com" width="640" height="358" /></div>
</div>
<a style="border-radius: 8px; margin-top: 16px; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 14px; text-decoration: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; padding: 10px; font-family: inherit; text-shadow: none; user-select: none; transition: all,.1s,ease-in; background-color: #0099e5; border: 1px solid #0099e5; color: #ffffff;" href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfQbtn-Hp9ctu5kf2hgC2tBEHqnwNwhSQgwIf367iXeR5ignQ/viewform?entry.406204652=Lowongan Kerja 2023 Karyawan Pabrik | Info Lowongan Kerja April... Pt Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk Purwakarta, Kabupaten Purwakarta, Jawa Barat " target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener">Report this Job</a> <a style="border-radius: 8px; margin-top: 16px; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 14px; text-decoration: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; padding: 10px; font-family: inherit; text-shadow: none; user-select: none; transition: all,.1s,ease-in; background-color: #0099e5; border: 1px solid #0099e5; color: #ffffff;" href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeau5SNc2mLXss22IUIZq_2xXesMOQDl2JqGLjFFeDTWUWdBA/viewform?entry.29576002=Lowongan Kerja 2023 Karyawan Pabrik | Info Lowongan Kerja April... <script type="application/ld+json">{"@context": "https://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "title": "Lowongan Kerja 2023 Karyawan Pabrik | Info Lowongan Kerja April... Pt Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk   Purwakarta, Kabupaten Purwakarta, Jawa Barat   ", "description": "LOWONGAN KERJA 2023 \u2013 LOKER 2023 VIA ONLINE PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk, merupakan Dalam beberapa dekade ini perusahaan tersebut telah bertransformasi menjadi sebuah perusahaan total food solution dengan kegiatan operasional yang mencakup seluruh tahapan proses produksi makanan. perusahaan ini yang bergerak dibidang produksi makanan dan juga minuman yang berdiri pertama kali pada tahun 1990 oleh Sudono Salim dengan nama PT Panganjaya Intikusuma.\n\nLOWONGAN KERJA 2023\n\nKemudian berikut ini merupakan Visi dan Misi perusahaan indofood sukses makmur :\n\u2022 Memberikan Solusi Atas Kebutuhan Pangan Secara Berkelanjutan.\n\u2022 Memberikan Kontribusi Bagi Kesejahtraan Masyarakat Dan Lingkungan Secara Berkelanjutan.\n\u2022 Meningkatkan Stakeholders\u2019values Secara Berkesinambung.\n\u2022 Senantiasa Meningkatkan Kompetensi Karyawan, Proses Produksi Dan Teknolgi Kami.\n\nKualifikasi pelamar :\n\u2022 Pria atau Wanita\n\u2022 Pendidikan minimal SMA/SMK sederajat\n\u2022 Tinggi badan minimal : Pria 160 cm, Wanita 150 cm\n\u2022 Sehat jasmani ...\n dan rohani\n\u2022 Tidak buta warna\n\u2022 Bersedia bekerja dengan sistem shift\n\nPersyaratan dokumen :\n\u2022 Daftar Riwayat Hidup (CV)\n\u2022 Surat lamaran kerja\n\u2022 Fotokopi KTP\n\u2022 Fotokopi Kartu Keluarga (KK)\n\u2022 Fotokopi Ijazah / SKHUN\n\u2022 Pas foto\n\u2022 Dan lain lain\n\nKami mengundang Anda yang memiliki semangat dan keterampilan yang sesuai untuk mengisi posisi yang tersedia dengan mengirimkan lamaran Anda di sini. Silakan kirimkan lamaran Anda jika Anda merasa memiliki kualifikasi yang sesuai dan ingin bergabung .\n\nMELAMAR DI SINI\n\nKami berharap Anda dapat menemukan pekerjaan yang cocok dengan keinginan dan kualifikasi Anda di sini. Jika ada pertanyaan atau kebutuhan lebih lanjut . 		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcS9axc4kDmDbM1Jg_wsVopfF-kfxXkzk6fi1g&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="BUMN Pelni Buka Lowongan Kerja Terbaru 2023, Ini Syarat dan Posisinya Halaman all - Kompas.com" width="640" height="320" /></div>
</div>
<b>LOWONGAN KERJA 2023 KARYAWAN PABRIK | INFO LOWONGAN KERJA .. PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk Purwakarta, Kabupaten Purwakarta, Jawa Barat </b>
<h3>Overview:</h3>
<blockquote><i>17 hari yang lalu
Pekerjaan tetap
Rp 4,8 jt per bulan
PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk
Purwakarta, Kabupaten Purwakarta, Jawa Barat </i></blockquote>
<h3>Responsibilities:</h3>
<div class=""></div>
&nbsp;
<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcT5Y78E6OPHV63Sk1-ddTuTNqPk0eJOgQ1WdA&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="Lowongan Kerja untuk Lulusan SMK Mesin dan Listrik di Anak Perusahaan PLN" width="640" height="314" /></div>
</div>
&nbsp;
<h3>Job Description:</h3>
<div class="">

PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk membuka lowongan kerja untuk tahun 2023. Perusahaan ini merupakan perusahaan terkemuka dalam bidang solusi pangan yang terlibat dalam seluruh tahapan produksi makanan. Sudono Salim mendirikan perusahaan ini pada tahun 1990 dengan nama PT Panganjaya Intikusuma. Visi dan misi perusahaan adalah menyediakan solusi pangan yang berkelanjutan, memberikan kontribusi pada kesejahteraan masyarakat dan lingkungan, meningkatkan nilai pemangku kepentingan secara berkelanjutan, dan meningkatkan kompetensi karyawan, proses produksi, dan teknologi.

Lowongan kerja tersedia untuk pria atau wanita dengan pendidikan minimal SMA/SMK sederajat dan tinggi badan minimal 160 cm untuk pria dan 150 cm untuk wanita. Kandidat harus sehat secara jasmani dan rohani, tidak buta warna, dan bersedia bekerja dengan sistem shift. Dokumen yang dibutuhkan adalah CV, surat lamaran kerja, fotokopi KTP, fotokopi kartu keluarga, fotokopi ijazah/SKHUN, dan pas foto.

Jika Anda merasa memenuhi persyaratan dan bersemangat untuk bergabung dengan perusahaan, silakan kirimkan lamaran Anda melalui tautan yang tersedia. Perusahaan berharap Anda dapat menemukan pekerjaan yang sesuai dengan keinginan dan kualifikasi Anda. Untuk informasi lebih lanjut, silakan kunjungi informasi lowongan kerja tahun 2023 di sini.

</div>
Summary:
<div class="jobsummary">Rp 4 8 jt per bulan PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk Purwakarta Kabupaten Purwakarta Jawa Barat Responsibilities Job Description LOWONGAN KERJA 2023 LOKER VIA ONLINE PT Indofood Sukses Makmur Tbk</div>
Location:
<div class="joblocation">Purwakarta, Kabupaten Purwakarta, Jawa Barat ID</div>
&nbsp;

		<excerpt:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="separator"><div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img alt='Lowongan Kerja SMA SMK Sederajat - 7 Perusahaan Swasta/ BUMN Cari Karyawan  Baru, Cek Syaratnya! - Tribun-timur.com' src='https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQ6gzOUJUNjQJS5wdQB3-dh7pBWfdhg0fQHaQ&usqp=CAU' width='640' height='359' /></div></div><br /><br /><br /><b>Loker Banjarnegara Tenaga Kerja Karyawan Pabrik SARI ROTI PT Nippon Indosari Corpindo Tbk   Banjarnegara, Kab. Banjarnegara, Jawa Tengah   </b>  <h3>Overview:</h3> <blockquote><i>4 hari yang lalu
Pekerjaan tetap<br/> PT Nippon Indosari Corpindo Tbk<br/>  Banjarnegara, Kab. Banjarnegara, Jawa Tengah   </i></blockquote><h3>Responsibilities:</h3> <div class"jobresponsibilities"> </div><br /><div class="separator"><div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img alt='Loker Lulusan SMA Non Pengalaman di Bandung Terbaru 2023 Berikut Daftar  Perusahaannya - Masukkerja.com' src='https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR6UphbumetE9CDMl5HuSzjJz_atG53uNpvEQ&usqp=CAU' width='640' height='359' /></div></div><br /><br /><br /> <h3>Job Description:</h3> <div class"jobdescription">Mykarir.web.id | PT Nippon Indosari Corpindo Tbk memproduksi dan mendistribusikan beragam produk yang halal, berkualitas tinggi, higienis dan terjangkau bagi seluruh konsumen.Fasilitas dan gaji di PT Nippon sudah cukup layak untuk menunjang proses kerja karyawan.

PT Nippon Indosari Corpindo Tbk sudah mendirikan pabrik di seluruh di Indonesia untuk memenuhi dan melayani seluruh konsumen.

Saat ini PT Nippon Indosari Corpindo Tbk kembali membuka puluang lowongan kerja dengan beberapa posisi, kualifikasi sebagai berikut.

Posisi Terbuka :
<li>Operator Produksi</li>
<li>Operator QC (Quality Control)</li>
<li>Staff Administrasi</li>
<li>Staff Gudang</li>
<li>Packing</li>

Kualifikasi :
<li>Pria dan Wanita</li>
<li>Usia maksimal 25 tahun</li>
<li>Minimal lulusan SMA, SMK, D3, S1, sederajat</li>
<li>Terbuka untuk semua jurusan pendidikan</li>
<li>Fresh Graduate / Pengalaman</li>
<li>Tidak sedang bekerja dan kuliah</li>
<li>Sehat jasmani dan rohani</li>
<li>Mampu bekerja dengan jujur, detail, dan teliti</li>
<li>Mampu bekerja secara tim dan individu</li>
<li>Bersedia bekerja dalam sistem ...</li>
 shift

Persyaratan Berkas Lamaran Yang di Siapkan :
<li>Surat Keterangan Sehat yang terdapat keterangan tinggi dan berat badan</li>
<li>Pasfoto terbaru uk 4×6 (penampilan rapi dan sopan)</li>
<li>Daftar Riwayat Hidup</li>
<li>Scan KTP</li>
<li>Scan surat lamaran kerja</li>
<li>Scan CV terbaru</li>
<li>Scan Ijazah / SKL</li>
<li>Scan SKCK (jika belum ada dapat di-upload KK)</li>
<li>Scan Transkrip nilai</li>
<li>Scan Sertifikat Vaksin</li>
<li>Scan paklaring (bagi yang sudah memiliki pengalaman kerja)</li>

Cara Melamar :

Silahkan Apply lamaran melalui form online recruitment PT. Nippon Indosari Corpindo Tbk dibawah ini:

Recruitment Form Online : LAMAR DISINI

PT. Nippon Indosari Corpindo Tbk

Alamat: Kawasan Industri MM 2100

Jl. Selayar No.Desa, Mekarwangi

Kec. Cikarang Barat, Bekasi, Jawa Barat 17530

Sari Roti Cibitung (PT Nippon Indosari Corpindo Tbk)

Pasokan Pabrik Makanan

Alamat: Jalan Selayar Blok Kav. A No.3

Mekarwangi, Kec. Cikarang Barat, Bekasi, Jawa Barat 17530

Pabrik PT. Nippon Indosari Corpindo Tbk

Produsen di Bekasi, Jawa Barat

Alamat: 33, Kawasan Industri Jababeka, Karangbaru

Kec. Cikarang Utara, Bekasi, Jawa Barat 17530

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Sales Representative (USOffice) Glocalize, LA , CA]]></title>
		<link>https://job.web.id.ku/california/sales-representative-us-office-glocalize-los-angeles-ca/</link>
		<pubDate>Sat, 29 Apr 2023 09:36:42 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[jobs]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://None</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRQEXcfQ7yJ46Q7y6PmhNbMRAGcumBPBXUQBw&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="Field Sales (Outside Sales) Representative job description template | Workable" width="640" height="229" /></div>
</div>
<b>Sales Representative (US Office) Glocalize Los Angeles, CA </b>
<h3>Overview:</h3>
<blockquote><i>Full-time
No degree mentioned
Glocalize
Los Angeles, CA </i></blockquote>
<h3>Responsibilities:</h3>
<div class="">

We are seeking a highly motivated individual to join our team in Singapore as a Sales Representative. The successful candidate will possess excellent communication and organizational skills, be a team player, and a self-starter. The ideal candidate must have a proven sales record and relevant experience in the localization media industry. Relationship management and business development skills are essential, and the ability to build strong relationships with clients is a must. The candidate must be results-driven, target-oriented, and able to work independently and as part of a team.

Responsibilities include presenting, promoting, and selling our products and services to existing and potential clients, analyzing customer requirements, and developing a comprehensive localization solution for each client. The Sales Representative will be expected to generate leads through cold calling and emailing and maintain positive client relationships. The candidate must meet sales targets and coordinate sales efforts with other team members and departments. Additionally, the candidate will be responsible for analyzing market potential, tracking sales, and reporting on customer needs and interests, as well as competitive activities and potential for new products and services.

The ideal candidate will have excellent problem-solving capabilities, attention to detail, and the ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines. Strong selling, negotiation, and communication skills are essential, as well as proficiency in English (both verbal and written). The ability to create and deliver sales decks tailored to clients' needs and knowledge of additional languages are an advantage. The Sales Representative must continuously improve through feedback from clients and peers and stay up-to-date with best practices and trends in the localization industry.

</div>
&nbsp;
<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSidV-4TUFml7AdfIEb3NTjr73nMCj7k8reMg&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="Contact Us | Sales Rep| Butler Human Services Furniture" width="640" height="398" /></div>
</div>
&nbsp;
<h3>Job Description:</h3>
<div class="">

GloZ, a globalization company that empowers stories, is looking for a highly motivated Sales Representative to join their team in their US office. The successful candidate must be able to work independently, possess strong communication and organizational skills, and be a great team player.

As a Sales Representative, the candidate will be responsible for promoting and selling GloZ's products and services to existing and prospective clients. The job requires the ability to perform cost-benefit analysis, establish and maintain positive business relationships, generate leads, and work with the team to resolve customer complaints and problems.

To be considered for the job, the candidate must have proven sales experience in the localization media industry, excellent communication and negotiation skills, and the ability to work independently and as part of a team. Other requirements include prioritizing, time management, and organizational skills, and the ability to meet deadlines under pressure.

GloZ encourages continuous improvement, so the Sales Representative must be open to feedback and possess problem-solving capabilities. They must also be detail-oriented, self-starter, and proactive, with excellent verbal and written English communication skills. Knowledge of an additional language is an advantage.

The Sales Representative must be highly motivated, target-driven, and have a proven track record in sales. They should also be able to create and deliver sales presentations tailored to clients' needs while keeping up-to-date with best practices and trends in the localization industries.

</div>
Summary:
<div class="jobsummary">Coordinate sales effort with other team members and other departments.. Analyze the territory market s potential track sales and status reports.. Supply sales reports on customer needs problems interests competitive activities and potential for new products and services.. Keep abreast of best practices and trends in the localization industries..</div>
Location:
<div class="joblocation">Los Angeles, CA US</div>
&nbsp;
<div class="mapouter">
<div class="gmap_canvas">

<iframe id="gmap_canvas" src="https://maps.google.com/maps?q=++Los+Angeles%2C+CA+++, US&amp;t=&amp;z=18&amp;ie=UTF8&amp;iwloc=&amp;output=embed" width="100%" height="240px" frameborder="0" marginwidth="0" marginheight="0" scrolling="no"></iframe>

<style>.mapouter{ position:relative;text-align:right;height:100%;width:100%;}</style> <style>.gmap_canvas {overflow:hidden;background:none!important;height:360px;width:100%;}</style></div>
</div>
&nbsp;
<div><strong>Job Key Points</strong> :
angeles,ca,full-time,glocalize,los,los angeles,no degree mentioned,office,office jobs,representative,sales,singapore,us,usasales-representative-us-office-glocalize-los-angeles-ca</div>
&nbsp;
<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRgR_i4NMnTYRpoNlYk-SujV5lzjE7UoQRZuQ&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="The 16 Best Sales Job Titles [Ranked by Search Volume] | Ongig Blog" width="640" height="271" /></div>
</div>
<a style="border-radius: 8px; margin-top: 16px; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 14px; text-decoration: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; padding: 10px; font-family: inherit; text-shadow: none; user-select: none; transition: all,.1s,ease-in; background-color: #0099e5; border: 1px solid #0099e5; color: #ffffff;" href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSfQbtn-Hp9ctu5kf2hgC2tBEHqnwNwhSQgwIf367iXeR5ignQ/viewform?entry.406204652=Sales Representative (Us Office) Glocalize Los Angeles, Ca " target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener">Report this Job</a> <a style="border-radius: 8px; margin-top: 16px; text-transform: uppercase; font-size: 14px; text-decoration: none; cursor: pointer; display: inline-block; padding: 10px; font-family: inherit; text-shadow: none; user-select: none; transition: all,.1s,ease-in; background-color: #0099e5; border: 1px solid #0099e5; color: #ffffff;" href="https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSeau5SNc2mLXss22IUIZq_2xXesMOQDl2JqGLjFFeDTWUWdBA/viewform?entry.29576002=Sales Representative (Us Office) Glocalize Los Angeles, Ca " target="_blank" rel="nofollow noreferrer noopener">Apply for this Job</a>

<script type="application/ld+json">{"@context": "https://schema.org", "@type": "JobPosting", "title": "Sales Representative (Us Office) Glocalize   Los Angeles, Ca   ", "description": "Sales Representative (US Office)\n\nGloZ is inviting professionals to join the League ...\n\n\nGloZ is a globalization company that helps entertainment companies, content creators, producers, and artists around the world to expand their boundaries beyond languages and cultures. Our vision is to bring the world together by empowering stories, as we believe that everyone and every business has its own stories. Our mission is to spread fun, love, laughter, tears, and knowledge by glocalizing great stories around the world.\n\nAt GloZ, we have an opening for an ace team member to join our amazing League. A successful candidate that we are looking for is a highly motivated individual who can work professionally and autonomously in a fast-paced environment. This individual candidate, which will be based in our Singapore office, must have strong communication skills with the right mix of organizational and prioritization skills; a great team player and a self-starter.\n\nSales Representative Job Summary\n\nWe are looking for a results-driven Sales Representative, who will be responsible for communicating the benefits of our products and services in order to drive sales. Excellent interpersonal skills and the ability to engage clients' prospects and relationships are crucial for this position. Experience working with a global fun team and a track record of excellent customer service are huge pluses as well.\n\nThis role is required to provide a comprehensive and appropriate localization solution for every customer to boost top-line revenue growth, expand the customer base, and overall profitability of the organization.\n\nKey Responsibilities\n\u2022 Present, promote, and sell our products and/or services using solid arguments to existing and prospective clients.\n\u2022 Perform cost-benefit and analysis of existing/potential customers to meet their requirements.\n\u2022 expedite the resolution of customer problems and complaints.\n\u2022 Achieve and meet sales targets and outcomes within the given schedule.\n\u2022 Coordinate sales effort with other team members and other departments.\n\u2022 Analyze the territory/market\u2019s potential, track sales and status reports.\n\u2022 Supply sales reports on customer needs, problems, interests, competitive activities, and potential for new products and services.\n\u2022 Keep abreast of best practices and trends in the localization industries.\n\u2022 Continuously improve through client's and peer's 					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Driver Box Truck Cowboy Usa North Charleston, SC]]></title>
		<link>https://job.web.id.ku/south-carolina/class-b-driver-26-box-truck-cowboy-usa-llc-north/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 28 Apr 2023 14:48:46 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[jobs]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://None</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcR65j3scpOQwrEU-P7QCRI2rO6SMFNfni4N9g&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="HOW TO MAKE MONEY DRIVING A 26-FOOT BOX TRUCK : u/megatranz" width="640" height="320" /></div>
</div>
<b>Class B Driver - 26' Box Truck Cowboy USA LLC North Charleston, SC </b>
<h3>Overview:</h3>
<blockquote><i>Dental insurance
Health insurance
Paid time off
Full-time
No degree mentioned
19–22 an hour
Cowboy USA LLC
North Charleston, SC </i></blockquote>
<h3>Responsibilities:</h3>
<div class="">

This position requires an individual with a valid CDL Class B license and at least 2 years of relevant experience. The successful candidate will be responsible for operating a 26' Box Truck while adhering to all applicable federal, state, and local laws and regulations, as well as company policies. It is imperative that the individual possesses a thorough understanding of commercial vehicle operation and safety practices, including operating vehicles with a GCWR of 26,001lbs or more and a towed weight of less than 10,000lbs.

Additionally, the individual will be responsible for proper freight loading and securement, as well as loading and unloading as necessary. Maintaining accurate records and logs in accordance with DOT and company policy, performing and documenting pre-trip, on-the-road, and post-trip inspections, and ensuring safe vehicle maneuvering and control are also key responsibilities.

The ideal candidate should possess a strong knowledge of Hours-of-Service regulations and be able to maintain ELD/paper logs to track and report duty hours. Flexibility and the willingness to work standby hours are required, as is maintaining the cleanliness and good condition of the vehicle's interior and exterior.

This position offers an 8-hour shift and a competitive pay range of $19.00 - $22.00 per hour, as well as a comprehensive benefits package including dental, health, and vision insurance, life insurance, paid time off, paid training, and a referral program. Any additional duties assigned should also be performed to the best of the individual's ability in a professional and timely manner.

8 hour shift
Pay: $19.00 - $22.00 per hour
Dental insurance
Health insurance
Life insurance
Paid time off
Paid training
Referral program
Vision insurance

</div>
&nbsp;
<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcSIHmN3UawaTaP8PFzqMcrahGDNvTEuBCooXQ&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="Truck &amp; Van Rental Archives - Page 6 of 25 - Marcus Allard Truck Rental" width="640" height="249" /></div>
</div>
&nbsp;
<h3>Job Description:</h3>
<div class="">

Job Purpose Summary:

Responsible for operating a 26' Box Truck while maintaining compliance with applicable federal, state and local laws and regulations as well as company policies ...

Key Responsibilities:

· Fully understand how to operate and safely drive commercial vehicles with a GCWR of 26,001lbs or more, with a towed weight of less than 10,000lbs.

· Responsible for proper loading and securing of freight to prevent movement and allow safe transport. Assist in loading and loading as required.

· Willing to load/unload and assist in operations at the terminal as required.

· Maintain accurate records and logs in accordance with DOT and company policy.

· Perform and document pre-trip inspections, on-the-road inspection, and post-trip inspections.

· Maneuver and control the vehicle in a safe fashion, which includes handling the vehicle on-site and in over-the-road situations, proper signaling, searching for hazards, controlling speed, lane positioning, matching speeds to road conditions, and the ability to drive during the daytime or nighttime.

· Knowledge and adherence to Hours-of-Service regulations, maintaining ELD/paper logs to track and report duty hours.

· Wiling to work stand by hours

· Keeping the vehicles interior and exterior clean and in good condition.

· Perform job functions in a safe manner to avoid personal injury and equipment damage

· Maintaining valid license and certifications.

· Any additional duties assigned

Job Type: Full-time

Pay: $19.00 - $22.00 per hour

Benefits:
<ul>
 	<li>Dental insurance</li>
 	<li>Health insurance</li>
 	<li>Life insurance</li>
 	<li>Paid time off</li>
 	<li>Paid training</li>
 	<li>Referral program</li>
 	<li>Vision insurance</li>
</ul>
Day range:
<ul>
 	<li>Weekend availability</li>
</ul>
Shift:
<ul>
 	<li>8 hour shift</li>
</ul>
Experience:
<ul>
 	<li>CDL Class B: 2 years (Required)</li>
</ul>
License/Certification:
<ul>
 	<li>Hazmat Endorsement (Preferred)</li>
</ul>
Work Location: In person

</div>
Summary:
<div class="jobsummary">Maneuver and control the vehicle in a safe fashion which includes handling the vehicle on-site and in over-the-road situations proper signaling searching for hazards controlling speed lane positioning matching speeds to road conditions and the ability to drive during the daytime or nighttime..</div>
Location:
<div class="joblocation">North Charleston, SC US</div>

					<item>
		<title><![CDATA[Karyawan Pabrik Sidoarjo, Jawa Timur]]></title>
		<link>https://job.web.id.ku/sidoarjo/karyawan-pabrik-job-loker-sidoarjo-kabupaten-sidoarjo-jawa-timur/</link>
		<pubDate>Fri, 28 Apr 2023 10:43:15 +0000</pubDate>
		<dc:creator><![CDATA[jobs]]></dc:creator>
		<guid isPermaLink="false">http://None</guid>
		<description></description>
		<content:encoded><![CDATA[<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcRbpXA8VBS2ezmivWZ3qjqMii69XnBe7xeHzg&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="PT Siantar Top Buka Lowongan Kerja Banyak Posisi, Terima Tamatan SMA, Gaji Mulai Rp 4 Jutaan - Tribun-timur.com" width="640" height="358" /></div>
</div>
<b>Kepala Divisi Produksi PT Siantar Top Tbk, Sidoarjo Jawa Timur PT Siantar Top Tbk Sidoarjo, Kabupaten Sidoarjo, Jawa Timur </b>
<h3>Overview:</h3>
<blockquote><i>Pekerjaan tetap
PT Siantar Top Tbk
Sidoarjo, Kabupaten Sidoarjo, Jawa Timur </i></blockquote>
About : <i>karyawan pabrik sidoarjo, jawa timur,Pekerjaan tetap,PT Siantar Top Tbk, Sidoarjo, Kabupaten Sidoarjo, Jawa Timur ,Kepala, Divisi, Produksi, Pt, Siantar, Top, Tbk, Sidoarjo, Jawa, Timur, Pt, Siantar, Top, Tbk, Sidoarjo, Kabupaten, Sidoarjo, Jawa, Timur</i>
<h3>Responsibilities:</h3>
<div class=""></div>
&nbsp;
<div class="separator">
<div style="margin-left: 1em; margin-right: 1em;"><img src="https://encrypted-tbn0.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:ANd9GcQkpP1qmyXQD-VVXpm6_de7-VJ6idOuIF7ESw&amp;usqp=CAU" alt="PT Siantar Top adalah Perusahaan di Bidang Produk Makanan Ringan, Simak Profilnya - Hot Liputan6.com" width="640" height="358" /></div>
</div>
&nbsp;
<h3>Job Description:</h3>
<div class="">

PT Siantar Top Tbk merupakan salah satu kelompok bisnis produk konsumen di Indonesia. Perusahaan mulai dibangun tahun 1972 dengan skala industri kecil dan bergerak di bidang produsen makanan dan minuman. Saat ini, ruang lingkup kegiatan Perusahaan bergerak dalam bidang industri makanan ringan, yaitu mie (snack noodle), kerupuk (crackers) dan kembang gula (candy).

Pada tahun 1987, perusahaan tersebut terdaftar dengan nama PT Siantar Top Industri berdasarkan akta No. 45 tanggal 12 Mei 1987 dari Ny. Endang Widjajanti, S.H., notaris di Sidoarjo.

Pada tahun 1991, PT Siantar Top Tbk mulai memproduksi varian permen. Perusahaan memperluas jaringannya dengan membuka pabrik baru di Medan (tahun 1998), Bekasi (tahun 2002), serta Makassar (tahun 2011). Selain itu, Siantar Top juga mengembangkan pabrik kopi tahun 2014.

Saat ini PT Siantar Top Tbk sedang membuka lowongan kerja terbaru untuk kandidat pelamar terbaik yang tertarik mengembangkan karir bersama PT Siantar Top Tbk di beberapa posisi ...
dan jabatan.

Lowongan Kerja PT Siantar Top Tbk

Posisi : Kepala Divisi Produksi

Kualifikasi:
<ul>
 	<li>Usia 35-45 tahun</li>
 	<li>S1 semua jurusan, dari fakultas Teknik lebih diutamakan</li>
 	<li>Pengalaman di posisi yang sama min 3 tahun</li>
 	<li>Diutamakan berpengalaman di industri manufaktur dengan min 300 tenaga kerja (dari manufaktur makanan &amp; minuman lebih diutamakan)</li>
 	<li>Memiliki jiwa leadership, tegas dan bertanggung jawab</li>
 	<li>Penempatan Sidoarjo, Jawa Timur</li>
</ul>
Tata Cara Melamar Kerja di PT Siantar Top Tbk

Apabila anda memenuhi kualifikasi lowongan kerja PT Siantar Top Tbk di atas, silahkan Kirim CV dan Pas foto terbaru via email berikut :

Email Rekrutment PT Siantar Top Tbk

ululadkha2929@gmail.com

Note : Mohon untuk tidak SPAM Lamaran ke email rekrutment

Proses Rekrutment PT Siantar Top Tbk tidak dipungut biaya (GRATIS)

Lowongan kerja terbuka sampai kuota terpenuhi, daftarkan dirimu secepatnya. Pastikan dirimu sesuai dengan kriteria, karena hanya pelamar yang memenuhi kualifikasi yang akan dipanggil ke tahap berikutnya.

Disclaimer : Melamar Pekerjaan di Situs Resmi Pejuangkaryawan.com Tidak Memungut Biaya

</div>

<div class="jobsummary">Kepala Divisi Produksi PT Siantar Top Tbk Sidoarjo Jawa Timur - Pekerjaan tetap -  Kabupaten Sidoarjo, Jawa Timur</div>
Location:
<div class="joblocation">Sidoarjo, Kabupaten Sidoarjo, Jawa Timur ID</div>
